inapplicable.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > nav > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > header:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > main:nth-child(4) > aside:nth-child(2) > nav > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > footer:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > div > nav > h2:nth-child(1)
